Welcome to the documentation web for our school project on "Matching Table Games between Users and a Library of Table Games.

This platform will have a comprehensive library of table games, with information on each game's rules, objectives, and recommended number of players. Users can browse through the library, learn about new games, and even suggest new games to be added.

Our user, will can register his games and see stadistic of his plays, in order to check his collection games and his playings of this games. Also, this site will provide a tool to create appointments between users to play together with this games.
